thread.title_full: ALDS TV schedule: Toronto Blue Jays vs. Texas Rangers Game 4 live stream: Time, TV, channel, how to watch online | NJ.com

author: Ryan Hatch | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: ALDS TV schedule: Toronto Blue Jays vs. Texas Rangers Game 4 live stream: Time, TV, channel, how to watch online
text:
The Toronto Blue Jays and Texas Rangers play Game 4 of the American League Division Series Monday afternoon.
Blue Jays' righty R.A. Dickey (11-11, 3.91) will take on Rangers' lefty Derek Holland (4-3, 4.91).
Here's everything you need to know about watching the game:
What : Blue Jays-Rangers
When : 4 p.m. ET
Where : Globe Life Park, Arlington, TX
Series record: 2-1, Texas
TV : FS1/SNET
Live stream : Fox Sports GO ; MLB.com (subscription required; $4.99 for all postseason minus World Series)
Radio : 105.3 The Fan, ESPN Radio, 1540am ESPN Deportes
